definition: to jump up suddenly/to bound up/to rise up in one bound
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to jump/to leap
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: The brute leapt into the air, flinging itself onto the machine.
sentences.chinese: 这畜生一跃而起，扑到了机器上。

sentences.english: He sprang to his feet, grabbing his keys off the coffee table…
sentences.chinese: 他一跃而起，从茶几上一把抓起自己的钥匙。

sentences.english: He bounded to his feet and waved good-bye to his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他一跃而起，向朋友们挥手告别。

sentences.english: Cao Cao from jumps into bed, pulled the chopped Jinshi.
sentences.chinese: 曹操从床上一跃而起，拔剑斩了近侍。

sentences.english: The soldiers sprang up when they heard the bugle.
sentences.chinese: 战士们听到号声一跃而起。

sentences.english: I saw a gun in his hand. He started to leap off the stand .
sentences.chinese: 只见他掏出手枪，从鞋摊上一跃而起。

sentences.english: To do sit-ups jumped up, forcing myself to love bed.
sentences.chinese: 做个仰卧起坐一跃而起，迫使自己不再恋床。

sentences.english: The Emperor leapt to his feet, and taking a lance from a stand of arms, he threw it at me.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝一跃而起，自武器架子上取了一支长矛朝我掷来。

sentences.english: On seeing us come into the room, he started up from the bed.
sentences.chinese: 看到我们走进了房间，他从床上一跃而起。

definition: to leap/to spring/to throw oneself
with a rolling or twisting movement/in a single movement/in one breath
suddenly
to get up on hind legs (esp. of horse)/to stand/to spring up
to charge/to pounce on/to swoop down on
suddenly/abruptly
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it
pinyin: shuo1 shi2 chi2 , na4 shi2 kuai4

definition: swiftly/suddenly
to jump/to leap
suddenly/quickly
to face upwards/to look up to the sky
sudden big stride forward
to dodge
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
to charge into
to flee/to scuttle/to exile or banish/to amend or edit
